trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that specifies authentication settings for a peer certificate.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个配置元素，指定对等证书的身份验证设置。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509PeerCertificateAuthenticationElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509PeerCertificateAuthenticationElement"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the certificate validation mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取证书验证模式。

trans-unit.source: The certificate validation mode.
trans-unit.target: 证书验证模式。

trans-unit.source: Copies the content of the specified configuration element to this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的配置元素的内容复制到此配置元素。

trans-unit.source: The configuration element to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 要复制的配置元素。

trans-unit.source: from is .
trans-unit.target: fromis .

trans-unit.source: The configuration file is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of custom peer certificate validator to be used.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要使用的自定义对等证书验证程序的类型。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] provides a default peer certificate validator that verifies the peer certificate against the trusted people store.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]提供一个默认对等证书验证程序，用于验证针对受信任的人存储的对等证书。

trans-unit.source: It also verifies that the certificate chains up to a valid root.
trans-unit.target: 它还验证，与有效的根证书相联系。

trans-unit.source: You can implement a custom validator to specify a different behavior and use this property to point to the custom validator.
trans-unit.target: 你可以实现自定义的验证程序，以指定不同的行为并使用此属性指向自定义验证程序。

trans-unit.source: The type of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator"></xref> to be used.
trans-unit.target: 一种<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator"></xref>使用。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the certificate revocation mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置证书吊销模式。

trans-unit.source: The system verifies that the peer certificate has not been revoked by looking it up in the revoked certificate list.
trans-unit.target: 系统来验证对等证书尚未吊销通过在吊销的证书列表中进行查找。

trans-unit.source: This check can be performed either by checking online or against a cached revocation list.
trans-unit.target: 此检查可通过联机或根据缓存的吊销列表执行。

trans-unit.source: Revocation checking can be turned off by setting this property to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode>.
trans-unit.target: 吊销检查可关闭到<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode>。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode>此属性设置

trans-unit.source: The certificate revocation mode.
trans-unit.target: 证书吊销模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the trusted store location where the peer certificate is validated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置对等证书验证受信任存储区位置。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] security system validates the peer certificate against a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]安全系统将会针对一种<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>的对等证书验证

trans-unit.source: The store location is specified using this property.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性指定的存储区位置。

trans-unit.source: The trusted store location where the peer certificate is validated.
trans-unit.target: 对等证书验证受信任存储区位置。
